# Alcademy: An App by the Students, for the Students

Welcome to the first-ever app of IGIT, **Alcademy**!

![Welcome](https://www.icegif.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/icegif-17.gif)

To use the app, you obviously need an internet connection. **Your data is private and secure**â€”we do not collect any of your personal information. All your data stays private and will remain so, always. In short, this app is completely secure (**developersâ€™ word**).

The app is made available to everyone **for free**, without any charges. I asked the professional community, and they told me that something like this would cost at least **â‚¹6 lakhs (INR)** or around **â‚¬2000â€“â‚¬5000** to develop. And I am not earning anything from this app lol. Iâ€™m not bragging; I just request you to show this app some love. This is an app **by the students and for the students**â€”and it would be nothing without the **contributors** who provided the notes. **They are the real developers of this app.**

### Special Thanks
I want to extend a special thanks to [Sekhar Parida](https://www.instagram.com/sekhar.in_?igsh=NzZjOWRpNjVxeGlm) for their incredible support and contributions.
